      • a

        public void a(HKWirelessListener paramHKWirelessListener)
        This sets which HKWirelessListener will be used for the sessuib created. This is an interface that can listen to changes in the volume and the state of the HK Device
        Parameters:
        paramHKWirelessListener - This is a listener for the HK Wireless

      • callbackDeviceStateUpdated

        public void callbackDeviceStateUpdated(long paramLong,
                                       int paramInt)
        This is called when the Device state is updated from starting up, shutting down etc.
        Parameters:
        paramLong - This is the long that refers to a particular device
        paramInt - An integer referring to the current state

        I guess the params refer to the old state and the new but I can;t tell why they would be two different types

      • callbackPlaybackStateChanged

        public void callbackPlaybackStateChanged(int paramInt)
        This is called when the playback state is changed. From paused, to play, to stop and vice versa
        Parameters:
        paramInt - The new state that the playbck has changed into

      • AddDeviceToSession

        public boolean AddDeviceToSession(long paramLong)
        This method allows you to add a device to the session. The ID can be acquired from the DeviceObj. Once a device is in a session, the play and pause commands will work on it
        Parameters:
        paramLong - The long ID of the device that you are adding to the session
        Returns:
        It returns whether the device was successfully added or not
        Carl's questions @CARL:
        I'm assuming this is true

      • RemoveDeviceFromSession

        Parameters:
        paramLong - The long ID of the device you are removing
        Returns:
        It returns true if the device is successfully removed
